briefTitle: Partial PTEN Deletion in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Partial PTEN Deletion and Its Relation to Clinicopathological Characteristics in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Detection of chromosome 10q23 deletion including PTEN locus in breast cancer patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* all stages of breast cancer in females.

Exclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer in males.
